name: tm33
effect: Teaches Reflect to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Reflect to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Ice Punch)

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Creates a wall of light that weakens physical attacks.
